trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint that is pre-configured for discovery operations over a UDP multicast binding.
trans-unit.target: Associazione di un endpoint standard preconfigurato per le operazioni di individuazione su un multicast UDP.

trans-unit.source: This endpoint inherits from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> and similarly has a fixed contract and supports two WS-Discovery protocol versions.
trans-unit.target: Questo endpoint eredita da <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> e allo stesso modo dispone di un contratto fisso e supporta due versioni del protocollo WS-Discovery.

trans-unit.source: In addition, it has a fixed UDP binding and a default address as specified in the WS-Discovery specifications (WS-Discovery April 2005 or WS-Discovery V1.1).
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, ha un'associazione UDP fissa e un indirizzo predefinito come indicato nelle specifiche WS-Discovery (WS-Discovery aprile 2005 o WS-Discovery v 1.1).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Sono attualmente supportate due versioni del protocollo WS-Discovery: WS-Discovery aprile 2005 e WS-Discovery v 1.1, che corrisponde alla <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A>valori di enumerazione.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe con l'indirizzo multicast specificato.

trans-unit.source: The multicast address.
trans-unit.target: L'indirizzo multicast.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe con l'indirizzo multicast specificato.

trans-unit.source: The multicast address.
trans-unit.target: L'indirizzo multicast.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> and multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"> </xref> e l'indirizzo multicast.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Sono attualmente supportate due versioni del protocollo WS-Discovery: WS-Discovery aprile 2005 e WS-Discovery v 1.1, che corrisponde alla <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A>valori di enumerazione.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: The multicast address for the UDP discovery endpoint.
trans-unit.target: L'indirizzo multicast per l'endpoint di individuazione UDP.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> and multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"> </xref> e l'indirizzo multicast.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Sono attualmente supportate due versioni del protocollo WS-Discovery: WS-Discovery aprile 2005 e WS-Discovery v 1.1, che corrisponde alla <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A>valori di enumerazione.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> with the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Uri>con l'indirizzo multicast.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The default UDP multicast address for IPv4.
trans-unit.target: Indirizzo multicast UDP predefinito per IPv4.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The default UDP multicast address for IPv6.
trans-unit.target: Indirizzo multicast UDP predefinito per IPv6.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'indirizzo multicast.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint.DefaultIPv4MulticastAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint.DefaultIPv4MulticastAddress>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint.DefaultIPv4MulticastAddress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Uri>istanza contenente l'indirizzo multicast.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings"></xref> instance associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings"> </xref> istanza associata di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings> to change UDP transport settings for the UDP endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings>per modificare le impostazioni di trasporto UDP per l'endpoint UDP.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings>

trans-unit.source: The UDP transport settings for the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Le impostazioni di trasporto UDP per l'endpoint.
